explains: adj. 笨重的；繁琐的，复杂的；（话语或措词）冗长的

sentences.en: Although the machine looks cumbersome, it is actually easy to use.
sentences.cn: 这机器虽然看起来笨重，其实使用起来很方便。

sentences.en: The organization changed its cumbersome title to something easier to remember.
sentences.cn: 这家机构把它那复杂累赘的名称改得好记一些了。

sentences.en: They're making efforts to streamline their normally cumbersome bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 他们正努力提高其通常臃肿的官僚机构的效率。
